name: Release v1.7.0 üåà
body:
## Changes

- chore: shift ios project to this project (#606) - @adityastic

## üöÄ Features

- feat: icon when saved clipart or saved list is empty (#646) - @adityastic
- feat: Add animation while transition (#632) - @refactor-droidyy
- feat: [Android] allow users to use other badges (#627) - @adityastic
- feat: Rate application feature so that users can rate app and provide feedback. (#622) - @tanmayrauth
- feat: about us selection in drawer (#615) - @tanmayrauth
- feat: multiplatform module for Android and iOS (#595) - @adityastic
- feat: Add AlertWarning for deleting badges and cliparts (#596) - @refactor-droidyy
- feat: feature to turn bluetooth on (#585) - @refactor-droidyy
- feat: Improve AboutUs (#572) - @refactor-droidyy
- feat: app specific directory storage (#559) - @refactor-droidyy

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- fix: app crashes (#647) - @adityastic
- fix: Semantic changes for delete confirmation message (#620) - @tanmayrauth
- fix: ios-framework deploy (#612) - @adityastic
- fix: ios-framework build (#605) - @adityastic
- fix: app launch issue (#601) - @refactor-droidyy
- fix: location issue with sending badges (#603) - @adityastic
- fix: Improve and Fix Saved Badge (#599) - @refactor-droidyy
- fix: Resolve drawer selection issue in draw clipart fragment (#597) - @tronku
- fix:  Improve drawer header #564 (#567) - @tanmayrauth
- fix: Resolve keyboard visibility issue (#587) - @tronku
- fix: Update latest UI screenshots in Readme (#582) - @refactor-droidyy
- fix: uneven clipart listing (#578) - @refactor-droidyy
- fix: Resolve intermediate clipart delete issue (#576) - @tronku
- fix: reverse listing of saved badges (#570) - @refactor-droidyy
- fix: Resolve delete cliparts issue (#568) - @tronku
- fix: support non latin languages (#563) - @adityastic
- fix: Release aab path (#553) - @iamareebjamal

## üß∞ Maintenance

- chore: updated screenshot ratio to 2.0 to test deployment (#657) - @adityastic
- chore: updated screenshots for deployment (#654) (#655) - @iamareebjamal
- chore: updated screenshots for deployment (#654) - @adityastic
- chore: fix fastlane deployment (#653) - @adityastic
- chore: release 1.7.0 (#651) - @adityastic
- chore: updated version name to 1.7.0 (#650) - @adityastic
- chore: [iOS] framework builds should be independent (#640) - @adityastic
- chore: fix upload script with android (#609) - @adityastic
- chore: refactor StorageUtils (#593) - @refactor-droidyy
- chore: improve storage utils and remove requestLegacyStorage (#562) - @adityastic
- chore: fail script when deployment not successful (#557) - @adityastic

## Dependencies and Libraries

- chore(deps): bump kluent from 1.59 to 1.60 (#637) - @dependabot-preview
- chore(deps): bump material from 1.2.0-alpha03 to 1.2.0-alpha04 (#634) - @dependabot-preview
- chore(deps): bump com.diffplug.gradle.spotless from 3.27.0 to 3.27.1 (#630) - @dependabot-preview
- chore(deps): bump kluent from 1.58 to 1.59 (#625) - @dependabot-preview
- chore(deps): bump com.diffplug.gradle.spotless from 3.26.1 to 3.27.0 (#613) - @adityastic
- chore(deps): bump junit from 4.12 to 4.13 (#600) - @dependabot-preview
- chore(deps): bump material from 1.1.0-beta01 to 1.2.0-alpha03 (#560) - @dependabot-preview

## Contributors

Thanks a lot to our contributors for making this release possible:
@adityastic, @dependabot-preview, @dependabot-preview[bot], @hpdang, @iamareebjamal, @refactor-droidyy, @tanmayrauth and @tronku

name: Release v1.3.0 üåà
body:
## Changes

## üöÄ Features

- feat: fdroid screenshots (#417) - @adityastic
- feat: ability to delete cliparts (#419) - @adityastic
- feat: Added toast when a badge is saved (#412) - @yashk2000
- feat: ability to show badges (#408) - @adityastic

## üêõ Bug Fixes

- fix: Use correct AAB and APK filenames (#432) - @ShridharGoel
- fix: indexOutOfBounds exception in drawlayout (#424) - @yashk2000
- fix: force stop when rejected permission (#418) - @adityastic
- fix: Prevented bluetooth form closing automatically when drawer activity is destroyed. (#415) - @yashk2000

## üß∞ Maintenance

- chore: Baseline master to dev (#435) - @iamareebjamal
- chore: update upload script (#433) - @adityastic
- chore: added aab support and improved script (#428) - @adityastic
- chore: Improve APK Names (#422) - @adityastic
- chore: remove before-install script  (#399) - @adityastic

## Dependencies and Libraries

- chore(deps): bump recyclerview from 1.1.0-alpha06 to 1.1.0-beta01 (#426) - @dependabot-preview
- chore(deps): bump appcompat from 1.1.0-beta01 to 1.1.0-rc01 (#425) - @dependabot-preview
- chore(deps): bump kluent from 1.50 to 1.51 (#407) - @dependabot-preview

## Contributors

Thanks a lot to our contributors for making this release possible:
@ShridharGoel, @adityastic, @cweitat, @dependabot-preview, @dependabot-preview[bot], @iamareebjamal and @yashk2000
